paper_abstract: We present a characterisation of {epsilon(1)(q + 1)+ epsilon(0), epsilon(1); n, q}-minihypers, q square, q = p(h), p > 3 prime, h >= 2, q >= 1217, for epsilon(0) + epsilon(1) < q(7/12)/2 - q(1/4)/2. This improves a characterisation result of Ferret and Storme (Des Codes Cryptogr 25(2): 143- 162, 2002), involving more Baer subgeometries contained in the minihyper.
paper_title: A characterisation result on a particular class of non-weighted minihypers
